attributes.action: Call for a referendum on NHS privatisation
attributes.additional_details: Becauae it wasnt in their manifesto, Jeremy Corbyn warned us before the 2017 and 2019 elections, even providing internal tory documents to prove it and was called a liar by Johnson and the Media, yet since then theyve halved the NHS budget and handed 81 billion to private business's while waiting lists hit 6 million, ambulance waiting times have gone from under 30 minutes to over 30 hours in some cases if they actually ever turn up at all
attributes.background: Ask the people before anymore of our NHS is sold off

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be a referendum about the NHS, but we're not sure exactly what you want people to be asked to choose between - full public ownership with no private sector involvement, full privatisation, the status quo, the changes proposed in the Health and Care Bill, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
